issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

Installing an sdk from a local zip currently fails with {{Cannot read property 'match' of undefined}} 

As the entryName shape changed when we moved to yauzl the version lookup in the sdk command need to change

h5.Steps to reproduce

1. Run {{appc ti sdk install <local zip>}}

h5.Actual

Cannot read property 'match' of undefined

h5.Expected

Installs fine
fields.summary: CLI: Cannot read property 'match' of undefined when installing an from a local zip file

comments.body:
PR: https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium/pull/361

Will be picked up automatically by appc-cli and hopefully available around 30 minutes after merge
